description:
Non-recursively lists the files & directories under the specified path.

Example (success): 
1. "/home/user1/dir1"@0 received on `path`
2. [ "foo.txt", "bar.txt" ]@0 sent on `children`

Example (failure): 
1. "/home/user1/dir1"@0 received on `path`
2. 
- "/home/user1/dir1"@0 sent on `bounced`
- {
  "error": "Error: ENOENT: no such file or directory, scandir 'home/user1'"
}@0 sent on `error`

36d9c3b0-c2c3-4ac9-a2e4-1bf8528f7600.description:
Receives the path of the directory to list the content of.

Example:
"/home/user1/dir1"

(To keep the application portable use "/" as path separator.)
36d9c3b0-c2c3-4ac9-a2e4-1bf8528f7600.name: path

acb2963b-7d28-4c79-b458-4cec00becf24.description:
Sends the names of files & directories under the specified path.

Example:
[
  "foo.txt",
  "subdir1"
]
acb2963b-7d28-4c79-b458-4cec00becf24.name: children

a994fc3f-0d26-4a45-b3e0-96d6ddd8ae6e.description:
Sends the path if the operation has failed.

Example:
"/home/user1/newdir"
a994fc3f-0d26-4a45-b3e0-96d6ddd8ae6e.name: bounced

07d91672-6601-4fc4-bd83-bdfe25786b18.name: error

name: io/file/Directory lister
